name: simplify-tabs
description: Automatically organize tabs and close unnecessary ones to maintain a simple tab layout.

simplifyTabs.closeTabs.enabled.description: Automatically close tabs when they are not in use.

simplifyTabs.closeTabs.retentionNumber.description: Number of tabs to retain when closing tabs. If set to less than 0, all tabs will be retained.

simplifyTabs.closeTabs.delay.description: Delay time when closing unused tabs.

simplifyTabs.closeTabs.shiftByPinnedTab.description: Shift the number of tabs to retain based on the number of pinned tabs.

simplifyTabs.closedTabsHistory.maxListIt.description: Number of closed tabs to display in history.

simplifyTabs.alignLeftTabs.enabled.description: Automatically align tabs to the left.

simplifyTabs.alignLeftTabs.delay.description: Delay time when aligning tabs to the left.

simplifyTabs.alignLeftTabs.movePinnedTab.description: Align pinned tabs to the left.

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
